question: Which network launches the AAE-1 submarine cable system.
explanation: Reliance Jio has launched the Asia-Africa-Europe (AAE-1) submarine cable system. It claims that it is the world's longest 100Gbps technology-based submarine system and will stretch for over 25,000km from Marseille, France to Hong Kong. The project is a combination of leading telecom service providers from Europe, the Middle East and Asia.
